prompts: Create a water-type Pokemon that can swim swiftly through oceans and has a fierce demeanor.
Show me a dragon-like creature with blue scales and sharp fins, showcasing its power.
Imagine a Pokemon that evolves from a small fish into a massive sea serpent with icy features.
Design a legendary water creature known for its destructive storms and intimidating presence.
Give me an aquatic Pokemon that thrives in deep-sea environments and has a menacing glare.
Generate a Pokemon with a serpentine body and spikes, emphasizing its dominance in water battles.
Make a fierce-looking Pokemon that combines elements of dragons and sea creatures for an epic design.
